description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国唯一的执政党。
description.en: The sole ruling party of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党的创建者和首任最高领导人，被朝鲜官方尊奉为永远的最高领导人。
description.en: The founder and first supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, officially revered as the eternal supreme leader of North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜早期共产主义运动领导人，朝鲜劳动党的创建者之一。
description.en: An early leader of the Korean communist movement and one of the founders of the Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜早期共产主义运动领导人，朝鲜劳动党国内派首领，后被金日成清洗。
description.en: An early leader of the Korean communist movement, head of the domestic faction of the Workers' Party of Korea, later purged by Kim Il-sung.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国现任最高领导人，担任朝鲜劳动党总书记。
description.en: The current supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, serving as the General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党的前身之一，由北朝鲜共产党和朝鲜新民党于1946年合并而成。
description.en: A predecessor of the Workers' Party of Korea, formed in 1946 by the merger of the North Korean Communist Party and the New People's Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党的前身之一，由朝鲜共产党、朝鲜人民党和南朝鲜新民党于1946年在朝鲜半岛南部合并而成。其成员在朝鲜劳动党内被称为“国内派”。
description.en: A predecessor of the Workers' Party of Korea, formed in southern Korea in 1946 by the merger of the Communist Party of Korea, the People's Party of Korea, and the New People's Party of South Korea. Its members were known as the 'domestic faction' within the WPK.

nodes.id: 朝鲜共产党北朝鲜分局

zh-cn: 朝鲜共产党北朝鲜分局
朝鲜共产党北朝鲜分局
en: North Korea Bureau of the Communist Party of Korea

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党的直接前身，于1945年10月10日在平壤成立。
description.en: The direct predecessor of the Workers' Party of Korea, founded in Pyongyang on October 10, 1945.

description.zh-cn: 由金日成创立的政治思想体系，后成为朝鲜劳动党的指导思想。
description.en: A political ideology developed by Kim Il-sung, which later became the guiding ideology of the Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 1956年，朝鲜劳动党内延安派和苏联派成员试图挑战金日成领导地位但最终失败的事件。
description.en: An unsuccessful attempt by members of the Yan'an and Soviet factions within the Workers' Party of Korea to challenge Kim Il-sung's leadership in 1956.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党早期的一个政治派别，主要由曾在中国共产党及其军队活动的朝鲜人组成，后被金日成清洗。
description.en: An early political faction in the Workers' Party of Korea, primarily composed of Koreans who had been active in the Communist Party of China and its armies, later purged by Kim Il-sung.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党早期的一个政治派别，主要由在苏联出生或取得苏联国籍的朝鲜人组成，后被金日成清洗。
description.en: An early political faction in the Workers' Party of Korea, primarily composed of Koreans born in or holding Soviet citizenship, later purged by Kim Il-sung.

description.zh-cn: 原朝鲜共产党代表人物，在金日成掌权初期被清除。
description.en: A representative figure of the original Communist Party of Korea, who was eliminated during the early stages of Kim Il-sung's consolidation of power.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党苏联派成员，曾任内阁副首相，后在金日成的清洗运动中自杀。
description.en: A member of the Soviet faction of the Workers' Party of Korea who served as Deputy Premier, later committed suicide during Kim Il-sung's purges.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党延安派核心人物，在朝鲜战争后被金日成解除权力。
description.en: A key figure in the Yan'an faction of the Workers' Party of Korea, who was stripped of power by Kim Il-sung after the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党国内派成员，1953年以“美国间谍”罪名被处决。
description.en: A member of the domestic faction of the Workers' Party of Korea, executed in 1953 on charges of being an 'American spy'.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党苏联派领袖，在八月宗派事件中试图挑战金日成失败后被开除出党。
description.en: Leader of the Soviet faction of the Workers' Party of Korea, who was expelled from the party after his failed attempt to challenge Kim Il-sung during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党延安派首领，在八月宗派事件后被清洗。
description.en: Leader of the Yan'an faction of the Workers' Party of Korea, purged after the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党延安派成员，在八月宗派事件中试图挑战金日成失败后被开除出党。
description.en: A member of the Yan'an faction of the Workers' Party of Korea, who was expelled from the party after his failed attempt to challenge Kim Il-sung during the August Faction Incident.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党在1960年代的一个政治派别，由抗日时期在朝鲜北方从事地下革命工作的人员组成，后因反对金正日世袭等问题被金日成清除。
description.en: A political faction within the Workers' Party of Korea in the 1960s, composed of individuals who engaged in underground revolutionary work in northern Korea during the anti-Japanese struggle. It was later purged by Kim Il-sung for opposing issues such as the hereditary succession of Kim Jong-il.

nodes.id: 军内反对派 (朝鲜劳动党)

zh-cn: 军内反对派 (朝鲜劳动党)

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党在1960年代的一个政治派别，由追随金日成从事抗日武装斗争的军事干部组成，后因“青瓦台事件”失败等原因被追责和清除。
description.en: A political faction within the Workers' Party of Korea in the 1960s, composed of military cadres who followed Kim Il-sung in the anti-Japanese armed struggle. It was later held responsible and purged for failures such as the 'Blue House Raid'.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国第二代最高领导人，金日成之子与接班人。
description.en: The second supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, son and successor of Kim Il-sung.

description.zh-cn: 1925年成立的朝鲜共产主义政党，后因内部斗争被共产国际下令解散，但其成员和组织仍在各地以党小组形式活动，并成为南北朝鲜劳动党的主要来源。
description.en: A Korean communist party founded in 1925. It was later ordered to dissolve by the Comintern due to internal strife, but its members and organizations continued to operate in various places as party cells, becoming the main source for both the North and South Korean Workers' Parties.

description.zh-cn: 即共产国际，是一个共产党和共产主义组织的国际联合组织。
description.en: Also known as the Comintern, an international organization of communist parties and organizations.

description.zh-cn: 由朝鲜独立同盟改组而成的政党，后与北朝鲜共产党合并为北朝鲜劳动党。
description.en: A political party reorganized from the Korean Independence Alliance, which later merged with the North Korean Communist Party to form the Workers' Party of North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 原在中国延安、太行山地区活动的朝鲜人组织，1946年改组为朝鲜新民党。
description.en: An organization of Koreans originally active in the Yan'an and Taihang Mountains regions of China, reorganized into the New People's Party of Korea in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 由朝鲜共产党北朝鲜分局更名而来的独立政党，后与朝鲜新民党合并为北朝鲜劳动党。
description.en: An independent political party renamed from the North Korea Bureau of the Communist Party of Korea, which later merged with the New People's Party of Korea to form the Workers' Party of North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜半岛南部成立的政党，后合并为南朝鲜劳动党。
description.en: A political party established in the southern Korean peninsula, which later merged to form the Workers' Party of South Korea.

en: New People's Party of South Korea

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜半岛南部成立的政党，后合并为南朝鲜劳动党。
description.en: A political party established in the southern Korean peninsula, which later merged to form the Workers' Party of South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国首任总统，其政府曾镇压南朝鲜劳动党。
description.en: The first President of the Republic of Korea, whose government suppressed the Workers' Party of South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 位于朝鲜半岛南部的国家，其《国家保安法》禁止朝鲜劳动党活动。
description.en: A country located in the southern part of the Korean Peninsula, whose National Security Act prohibits the activities of the Workers' Party of Korea.

nodes.id: 朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会
中央政治局常务委员会
en: Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党最高决策机构。
description.en: The highest decision-making body of the Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜政治人物，朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会委员。
description.en: North Korean politician, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜政治及军事人物，朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会委员。
description.en: North Korean political and military figure, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜政治人物，朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会委员。
description.en: North Korean politician, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜政治人物，朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会委员。
description.en: North Korean politician, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜政治人物，朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会委员。
description.en: North Korean politician, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 一种共产主义意识形态，曾是朝鲜劳动党的指导思想之一，后被主体思想取代。
description.en: A communist ideology that was once one of the guiding principles of the Workers' Party of Korea, later replaced by the Juche Idea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的武装力量，根据朝鲜劳动党党章，是该党的革命武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, which, according to the WPK charter, is the revolutionary armed force of the party.

description.zh-cn: 1968年朝鲜针对韩国策划的一次失败的袭击事件，此事导致朝鲜劳动党军内反对派被追责清除。
description.en: A failed raid planned by North Korea against South Korea in 1968, which led to the military opposition faction of the Workers' Party of Korea being held accountable and purged.

description.zh-cn: 指苏联及其他社会主义国家在斯大林去世后，清除其个人崇拜和政策影响的运动。这一风潮影响了金日成，促使他发展主体思想以防其蔓延至朝鲜。
description.en: Refers to the movement in the Soviet Union and other socialist countries after Stalin's death to eliminate his personality cult and policy influence. This trend influenced Kim Il-sung to develop the Juche Idea to prevent its spread to North Korea.

en: 20th Congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 1956年苏联共产党的一次代表大会，赫鲁晓夫在此次会议上发表了反对斯大林个人崇拜的秘密报告，开启了去斯大林化运动。
description.en: A 1956 congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union where Khrushchev delivered a secret speech denouncing Stalin's personality cult, initiating the de-Stalinization movement.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林之后的苏联领导人，在苏共二十大上推动了去斯大林化。
description.en: The leader of the Soviet Union after Stalin, who promoted de-Stalinization at the 20th Congress of the CPSU.

description.zh-cn: 1949年6月30日，北朝鲜劳动党和南朝鲜劳动党合并为统一的朝鲜劳动党。
description.en: On June 30, 1949, the Workers' Party of North Korea and the Workers' Party of South Korea merged to form the unified Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 1949年6月30日，北朝鲜劳动党和南朝鲜劳动党合并为统一的朝鲜劳动党。
description.en: On June 30, 1949, the Workers' Party of North Korea and the Workers' Party of South Korea merged to form the unified Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 根据朝鲜劳动党党章，金日成是朝鲜劳动党的创建者。
description.en: According to the charter of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Il-sung is the founder of the party.

description.zh-cn: 金镕范是朝鲜劳动党的创建者之一。
description.en: Kim Yong-bom was one of the founders of the Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朴宪永是朝鲜劳动党的创建者之一。
description.en: Pak Hon-yong was one of the founders of the Workers' Party of Korea.

relationships.source: 朝鲜共产党北朝鲜分局

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党将朝鲜共产党北朝鲜分局的成立日（1945年10月10日）定为建党纪念日，视其为直接前身。
description.en: The Workers' Party of Korea designated the founding date of the North Korea Bureau of the Communist Party of Korea (October 10, 1945) as its founding anniversary, considering it a direct predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 金日成在1955年12月28日的演讲中首次提出“主体”概念，创立了主体思想。
description.en: Kim Il-sung first introduced the concept of 'Juche' in a speech on December 28, 1955, thereby creating the Juche Idea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党将主体思想确立为党的指导思想，并在后续的党代会和宪法修改中不断强化其地位。
description.en: The Workers' Party of Korea established the Juche Idea as the party's guiding ideology, and continuously strengthened its status in subsequent party congresses and constitutional amendments.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜劳动党在1980年第六次代表大会上取消了党章中马克思列宁主义的指导思想地位，并于1992年在宪法中将其指导地位完全由主体思想取代。
description.en: The Workers' Party of Korea removed Marxism–Leninism's status as a guiding ideology from the party charter at the 6th Congress in 1980 and completely replaced it with the Juche Idea in the constitution in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 金日成从苏联回国后，首先清除了原朝鲜共产党的代表人物玄俊赫。
description.en: After returning from the Soviet Union, Kim Il-sung first eliminated Hyon Chun-hyok, a representative figure of the original Communist Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 1951年11月，金日成指责许嘉谊在吸收党员问题上搞“关门主义”，撤销其一切职务，最终导致许嘉谊自杀。
description.en: In November 1951, Kim Il-sung accused Ho Ka-i of 'sectarianism' in party member recruitment, removed him from all posts, which ultimately led to Ho Ka-i's suicide.

description.zh-cn: 1951年，金日成以“平壤失守”和“作战不力”为由解除了延安派核心人物武亭的权力。
description.en: In 1951, Kim Il-sung used the 'fall of Pyongyang' and 'ineffective combat' as reasons to remove Mu Chong, a key figure of the Yan'an faction, from power.

description.zh-cn: 1953年，金日成逮捕了国内派首领朴宪永，并于1955年12月将其处决，最终覆灭了国内派。
description.en: In 1953, Kim Il-sung arrested Pak Hon-yong, the leader of the domestic faction, and had him executed in December 1955, ultimately wiping out the domestic faction.

description.zh-cn: 1953年，金日成逮捕了李承烨，并以“美国间谍”罪名于7月30日将其处决。
description.en: In 1953, Kim Il-sung arrested Ri Sung-yop and had him executed on July 30 on charges of being an 'American spy'.

description.zh-cn: 在八月宗派事件中，党内延安派和苏联派成员试图联合推翻金日成的领导地位。
description.en: During the August Faction Incident, members of the Yan'an and Soviet factions attempted to jointly overthrow Kim Il-sung's leadership.

description.zh-cn: 金日成组织力量反击，挫败了八月宗派事件中的挑战，并清洗了相关人员。
description.en: Kim Il-sung organized his forces to counterattack, thwarting the challenge during the August Faction Incident and purging the involved personnel.

description.zh-cn: 在八月宗派事件后，金日成对延安派进行了清洗，至1958年清洗完毕。
description.en: After the August Faction Incident, Kim Il-sung purged the Yan'an faction, completing the process by 1958.

description.zh-cn: 在八月宗派事件后，金日成对苏联派进行了清洗，至1961年清洗完毕。
description.en: After the August Faction Incident, Kim Il-sung purged the Soviet faction, completing the process by 1961.

description.zh-cn: 1967年5月，金日成以反对资产阶级、修正主义为名，批判并清除了甲山派。
description.en: In May 1967, Kim Il-sung criticized and purged the Kapsan faction under the pretext of opposing bourgeois and revisionist ideas.

relationships.target: 军内反对派 (朝鲜劳动党)

description.zh-cn: 1968年“青瓦台事件”失败后，金日成追究军方领导责任，批判并处理了军内反对派。
description.en: After the failure of the 1968 'Blue House Raid,' Kim Il-sung held military leaders accountable, criticizing and dealing with the military opposition faction.

description.zh-cn: 金日成通过一系列党内清洗巩固权力后，于1974年确立了金正日的接班人地位。
description.en: After consolidating power through a series of internal purges, Kim Il-sung established Kim Jong-il's status as his successor in 1974.

description.zh-cn: 金正恩是现任朝鲜劳动党总书记，为该党的最高领导人。
description.en: Kim Jong-un is the current General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, serving as its supreme leader.

description.zh-cn: 根据朝鲜劳动党党章，朝鲜人民军是该党的革命武装力量。
description.en: According to the charter of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Korean People's Army is the party's revolutionary armed force.

relationships.source: 朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央政治局常务委员会是朝鲜劳动党的最高决策机构。
description.en: The Presidium of the Political Bureau is the highest decision-making body of the Workers' Party of Korea.

relationships.target: 朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 崔龙海是朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会委员。
description.en: Choe Ryong-hae is a member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

relationships.target: 朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 李炳哲是朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会委员。
description.en: Ri Pyong-chol is a member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

relationships.target: 朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 金德训是朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会委员。
description.en: Kim Tok-hun is a member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

relationships.target: 朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 赵甬元是朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会委员。
description.en: Jo Yong-won is a member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

relationships.target: 朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 朴正天是朝鲜劳动党中央委员会政治局常务委员会委员。
description.en: Pak Jong-chon is a member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 根据大韩民国的《国家保安法》，朝鲜劳动党被禁止在该国活动。
description.en: According to the National Security Act of the Republic of Korea, the Workers' Party of Korea is banned from operating in the country.

description.zh-cn: 1928年，因朝鲜共产党内部宗派斗争，共产国际下令解散朝鲜共产党。
description.en: In 1928, due to internal factional struggles within the Communist Party of Korea, the Comintern ordered its dissolution.

description.zh-cn: 李承晚政府对南朝鲜劳动党进行了镇压，导致其大多数领导人转移到朝鲜半岛北部。
description.en: The Syngman Rhee government suppressed the Workers' Party of South Korea, causing most of its leaders to move to the northern part of the Korean peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 在1956年的苏共二十大上，赫鲁晓夫发表秘密报告反对斯大林个人崇拜，开启了去斯大林化运动。
description.en: At the 20th Congress of the CPSU in 1956, Khrushchev delivered a secret speech denouncing Stalin's personality cult, which initiated the de-Stalinization movement.

description.zh-cn: 苏联反个人崇拜的风潮蔓延至朝鲜，促使金日成发展主体思想以巩固自身地位并防止其影响。
description.en: The trend of anti-personality cult from the Soviet Union spread to North Korea, prompting Kim Il-sung to develop the Juche Idea to consolidate his position and prevent its influence.
